epitome.tips.akashic_tome.text: The Akashic Tome you spawn with, has every guide book in the pack.
epitome.tips.bed_spreads.text: Got your favourite banner? Craft it with your bed to change your bed sheets.
epitome.tips.chunkload.text: Force chunk-loading to keep your automations working when you are offline. (server only)
epitome.tips.claim.text: Claim your chunks to protect them from mob and player griefing.
epitome.tips.find_me.text: Cannot find something in chests? Stand nearby your chests, search the item in JEI, hover your mouse over it and press Y.
epitome.tips.miki.title: Luv U MIKI <3
epitome.tips.olive.title: You should befriend a goose!
epitome.tips.pets.text: Your pets never die! Learn how to revive them with 'save your pets' mod.
epitome.tips.rad.text: Audio not working? You can change your audio device in music and volume controls.
epitome.tips.oauth.text: Refresh expired sessions via the top left OAuth Login button in multiplayer menu.
epitome.tips.silent_gear.text: Convert your vanilla tools and armour to their silent gear variants by putting them in a crafting grid. They will become repairable, upgradable and will no longer disappear when broken.
epitome.tips.sol_carrot.text: Eating unique foods gives you extra hearts every 8 unique meals.
epitome.tips.sound_muffler.text: Click the little speaker icon (above your character, in your inventory) and disable any undesired sounds.
epitome.tips.speed_building.text: Ladders and rails work like scaffolds, stand still and hold right click to place them.
epitome.tips.trample_stopper.text: Crops are protected from being trampled.
epitome.tips.pixie.text: Pixies were sternly told not to steal items from your inventory.
epitome.tips.dragon_spawn.text: Dragons left the world in ancient times. You can only find their remains now. Some dragon tales and legends mention distant lands called Gaia. Can you rediscover them?
epitome.tips.double_door.text: Sneak right click to open only one side of a double door.
epitome.tips.jek.text: JEK lets you assign any key combinations with Ctrl, Shift and Alt to controls, e.g. Ctrl + Alt + v.
epitome.tips.jek_tooltip.text: Hover over the search box in controls menu and read the tooltip.
epitome.tips.vampire_bite.text: Vampires were vaccinated against Sanguinare Vampiris, they can no longer infect you via biting. There are rumors that Sanguinare Vampiris still exists inside their broken fangs.
